user_query: I'm a parent and my child is obsessed with Minecraft. Can you provide me with the latest blocklist of Minecraft sites using the StopModReposts Blocklist API? Additionally, I would like to scrape the internal links and emails from a Minecraft parenting forum using the Email and internal links scraper API. Finally, I need historical data on the number of visits to popular Minecraft educational websites using the SimilarWeb (historical data) API.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the latest blocklist of Minecraft sites using StopModReposts Blocklist API.
Scrape the internal links and emails from a Minecraft parenting forum using the Email and internal links scraper API.
Fetch historical data on the number of visits to popular Minecraft educational websites using the SimilarWeb (historical data) API.
